name: Titanium.UI.iOS.GravityBehavior
summary: Gravitational force to apply to an item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.summary: View object to add to the behavior.

methods.name: removeItem
methods.summary: Removes the specified item from this behavior.

properties.name: angle
properties.summary: Specifies the angle of the gravity vector in radians.
properties.description: To configure the gravity vector, you need to also specify the magnitude property.

properties.name: gravityDirection
properties.summary: Specifies the direction of the gravity vector as an x, y pair.
properties.description: For example, specifiying {x: 0.0, y: 1.0} indicates a downward gravity force of 1000 points per second squared.

properties.name: magnitude
properties.summary: Specifies the magnitude of the gravity vector.
properties.description:
A value of 1.0 represents an acceleration of 1000 points per second squared.

To configure the gravity vector, you need to also specify the angle property.
